answers.answer: Ahhh congrats to you. I hope he continues to be a little superhero and also have a good recovery.how long do you think he will be in the nicu
Wow that all happened so fast! Hope you get to have him home with you soon! How many weeks were you?
...oops sorry I see it now 34...Stupid pregnancy brain...
Thank you. They said he might be there until my due date june 11th it all depends on him hopefully he sooner then later.
Congratulations! I hope he gets to come home sooner rather than later.
My due date is June 11th too. Praying he gets to come home to you sooner. Glad everything went okay for you and hes doing well.
Congrats on your baby boy!! wish you the best of luck
Congrats!!! Sorry that it had to be like that, must have been a bit scary, but it's great he's eating well and recovering! How're you feeling after your c section?
Congratulations! I hope he gets to come home soon! I know that is hard.
Thank you everyone. He took his full feeding today and is 4lbs 040z so he is doing great. I am doing good getting my 15 staples out tomorrow before i have to leave which i am scared to leave my baby
Wow, congrats mommy, awesome gift for daddy on his birthday... I am glad that both of you are doing well
Congrats! Hopefully baby gets strong fast so he can hurry and make it home with his family!
Congratulations, hope he comes home soon!!!
Congratulations!! Hope you and baby are doing well. :-)

question: I went to my appt Monday 5/4/15 @1pm dr said baby wasn't doing what they wanted so they sent me to the hospital to be monitored and i already had preeclampsia and high bps and they wouldn't stay controlled so dr said it was best to slowly induce me but as we got started babys heartbeat kept dropping and on the 3rd time drs called in for emergency csection and everything happened so fast and crazy he was born 5/4/15 @9:58pm (on his dad's bday) 4lbs 06oz 17inches he has been nicu since Monday and has been doing pretty good he is breathing on his own and been keeping down the formula and took whole feeding through a nipple so thats exciting and he even gained a few so he is 4lbs 4oz now. Tomorrow i finally go home after 4 days and i am so overwhelmed with having to leave him and can't be with him all the time.
title: Baby Isaiah is here @34wks
